meanings.definition: A device that makes a clicking sound when pressed.
meanings.sent1: I used the clickers to answer the questions in class.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out clickers for us to use during the quiz.
meanings.sent3: The clickers on the remote control were so fun to press repeatedly.
meanings.sent4: The clickers in the game controller felt like tiny buttons of joy.
meanings.sent5: The clickers on the keyboard helped me type faster.

meanings.definition: A person who clicks on something, typically on a computer or device.
meanings.sent1: The clickers on the mouse helped me navigate the computer easily.
meanings.sent2: She is a fast clicker when browsing the internet.
meanings.sent3: The clicker in the office always has a busy day.
meanings.sent4: He is a skilled clicker, always finding what he needs online quickly.
meanings.sent5: The clicker at the tech store was very knowledgeable about computers.

meanings.definition: Plural form of clicker, referring to multiple devices that make a clicking sound.
meanings.sent1: The classroom was filled with the sound of clickers during the activity.
meanings.sent2: We need to collect all the clickers after the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The clickers on the table seemed to have a clicking conversation.
meanings.sent4: The clickers in the room created a symphony of clicking noises.
meanings.sent5: The clickers on the counter were neatly arranged in rows.
